QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.DRUG_EXPOSURE_ID ,t.PERSON_ID ,t.DRUG_CONCEPT_ID as CONCEPT_ID ,t.DRUG_EXPOSURE_START_DATE as START_DATE ,t.DRUG_EXPOSURE_END_DATE as END_DATE ,t.DRUG_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID as TYPE_CONCEPT_ID FROM {sc}.DRUG_EXPOSURE as t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by t.PERSON_ID, t.DRUG_EXPOSURE_ID
